name: LYKE_Home_Ramos_Cream_Reclining_Loveseat
reviews: Not bad for the price, you get what you pay for. If I had to pay retail for this, I'd be pretty disappointed. Not very sturdy, when we try to move it, the top piece comes off sometimes, but it just clicks right back in. Only major complaint is the back of the couch looks cheap. We had to put a decorative chest behind it to hide the back. If you're using it up against a wall, then it's not a big deal. Comfortable, love the cup holders. Color is a little darker than pictured, not nearly as bright/creamy, almost has more of a yellow tone to it, but this could vary depending on color of the room.

Everything I have purchased from overstock has been good.I Have never returned anything, There is no need. This is not my first order.I will only shop with any other company, I am picky.Thanks for the great service.
description: After a long day come home to the Ramos Reclining loveseat by LYKE Home finished in a Cream leather it is the perfect touch to your living area. Padded seats, plush backs and arms provide the ultimate comfort you will need.Type: LoveseatMaterial: LeatherStyle: ContemporaryAssembly: Assembly RequiredColor: CreamStyleContemporaryMaterialLeatherTypeLoveseatAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorCream
